description: pillar with elaborately decorated large domed bowl on top; two women against pillar supporting bowl with one raised arm each; standing on a small pedestal; bowl decorated with horned head at center of rim; dragon motifs around edge below rim; animal heads on ends of small pedestal; book(?) lower left corner
inscription:
Signature, Date, and Inscriptions

below image in black: In Roma presso Carlo Losi l\'anno 1773   Ant. Sal. exc.  | in pencil on sheet: 2-264   No. 20
title: Print
